site.name: Sparkplug
site.description: High-energy audience engagement experiences for teams, corporates, and communities across India, built around rhythm, collaboration, and pure human energy.

hero.title: UNLOCKING PEOPLE POWER
hero.subtitle: Energise. Connect. Transform your people.
hero.description: With our high-energy audience engagement experiences for teams, corporates, and communities across India, built around rhythm, collaboration, and pure human energy.

challenge.title: What We Do
challenge.subtitle: We Turn Teams Into a Connected Force
challenge.description: High-energy experiences that get teams talking, laughing, and actually enjoying each other's company. Trusted by global brands.

causes: Everyone becomes part of the beat
Fastest way to energise a room

items.name: Corporate Drum Circles
items.tagline: Where suits, interns, and senior leaders drop their roles and pick up a drum.
items.description: Everyone becomes part of the same beat.

items.name: Team-Building Workshops
items.tagline: Interactive sessions designed to unlock creativity, teamwork, and trust

items.name: Culture & Engagement Sessions
items.tagline: High-energy modules that boost morale, belonging, and on-ground participation.

theoryOfChange.title: Why Teams Love Sparkplug
theoryOfChange.description: Backed by years of facilitation experience and a track record with some of the world's biggest brands, we know how to turn any gathering into a powerful experience.

steps.title: Zero Skill Required
steps.description: No musical background needed. Everyone can participate from the very first beat.

steps.title: 100% Participation
steps.description: Our facilitation ensures everyone is engaged. No spectators, only participants.

steps.title: Breaks Barriers Instantly
steps.description: Watch hierarchies dissolve as CEOs and interns drum together as equals.

steps.title: Works for Any Size
steps.description: From intimate teams of 10 to stadium crowds of 5,000+. We scale seamlessly.

clients.title: Taking Energy Nationwide
clients.subtitle: Across Brands. Across Cities. Across India.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: People connect best when they experience something together.
hero.description: Sparkplug was born from a simple idea: People connect best when they experience something together.

foundingAspiration.title: Our Story
foundingAspiration.content: After years of working with corporates and communities, we saw the same thing: people open up in engagement that didn't feel forced, boring, or predictable. So we built Sparkplug — a space where music, rhythm, and intentional facilitation come together to energise teams and spark meaningful connection.

items.title: We don't "perform". We involve.
items.description: Everyone becomes part of the experience.

items.title: We design for real outcomes.
items.description: Not just passive entertainment, but active engagement that improves communication, trust, and team morale.

items.title: We bring world-class facilitation.
items.description: Simple, clean, and deeply human sessions shaped by years of experience.

items.title: We work with any group size.
items.description: Small teams to stadium-level crowds across India.

about.vision: A world where teams are energized, connected, and inspired. Where collaboration happens naturally, creativity flows freely, and every gathering becomes a powerful mix of connection and pure fun.
about.mission: To design high-energy experiences that transform how teams connect and collaborate. We create memorable moments through drum circles, workshops, and engagement sessions that leave participants energized, inspired, and ready to work better together.

values.title: We Involve, Not Perform
values.description: Everyone becomes part of the experience. No spectators, only participants.

values.title: Real Outcomes
values.description: Not just passive entertainment, but active engagement that improves communication, trust, and team morale.

values.title: World-Class Facilitation
values.description: Simple, clean, and deeply human sessions shaped by years of experience.

values.title: Any Group Size
values.description: Small teams to stadium-level crowds across India.

hero.title: Our Experiences
hero.subtitle: High-Energy Engagement That Transforms
hero.description: From corporate drum circles to custom experiences, we create moments that energize, connect, and inspire.

experiences.name: Corporate Drum Circles
experiences.tagline: The fastest way to energise a room
experiences.description: A high-energy, music-led experience where everyone, CEO to intern, becomes part of one rhythm. Corporate drum circles are one of the fastest ways to energise a room, break silos, and create instant connection.
experiences.perfectFor: Off-sites, annual meets, R&Rs, launch events, and culture days.

experiences.name: Team-Building Workshops
experiences.description: Our collaboration-focused workshops help teams communicate better, build trust, and solve problems creatively. These are not typical corporate games. These are high-engagement, gamified experiences developed to bring out teamwork naturally.
experiences.perfectFor: Onboarding, leadership development, and cross-functional collaboration.

experiences.name: Workplace Culture Experiences
experiences.description: Every workplace has people who've drifted into silos without even realising it. Our quick 45–60 minute modules are built for offices that want regular engagement, not once-a-year events. Great for energising the office, refreshing teams, and building a culture of belonging.

experiences.name: Community Experiences
experiences.tagline: Fun, memorable experiences for any celebration
experiences.description: From birthday parties and baby showers to weddings and large-scale fan engagement events like IPL activations, we design fun, memorable experiences that leave participants energised, connected, and fully immersed in the moment.

experiences.name: Custom Experiences
experiences.tagline: If you can imagine it, we can build it
experiences.description: Have something unique in mind? We design custom engagement experiences for corporates, communities, events, and hybrid/virtual formats. If you can imagine it, we can build it — music-led, rhythm-driven, or completely tailor-made.

activatingExisting.description: A high-energy, music-led experience where everyone, CEO to intern, becomes part of one rhythm. Corporate drum circles are one of the fastest ways to energise a room, break silos, and create instant connection.
